CONFIRM_OPERATION.TITLE: Operation confirmation code
CONFIRM_OPERATION.QUESTION_MAIL: Enter the code we sent you by email
CONFIRM_OPERATION.QUESTION_SMS: Enter the code we sent you by sms

GOOGLE_RECAPTCHA.INVALID_INPUT_SECRET: The secret parameter is invalid or malformed.
GOOGLE_RECAPTCHA.INVALID_INPUT_RESPONSE: The response parameter is invalid or malformed.
GOOGLE_RECAPTCHA.BAD_REQUEST: The request is invalid or malformed.
GOOGLE_RECAPTCHA.TIMEOUT_OR_DUPLICATE: The response is no longer valid: either is too old or has been used previously.

MESSAGE.NO_RECORD: Data not present or invalid input
